welcome-sentence: Welcome {{name}} to EduPlay, where education meets fun! We believe that learning should be an exciting adventure. Our platform blends education with play, making it enjoyable for learners of all ages. Dive into interactive lessons, engaging activities, and games designed to spark curiosity and foster a love for learning. Let's make education a joyful experience together!s
error-login-text: Error with email, password, or both
footer-team: Developed by Binary Brains - Faculty of Computer and Information Science.
contact-heading: Get in touch with us! Feel free to send us a message, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
name: Name
answer-submitted: Answer is Submitted Successfully you got {{rank}}
select-game: Select Game you want to Study With ?
five-hints-description: Five Hints is a thrilling guessing game where you test your knowledge by uncovering the correct answer with minimal hints! You start with no clues, and every 30 seconds, a new hint is revealed. The faster you guess, the higher your rank! If you crack the mystery on the first try, you’ll achieve the top rank. But beware—every additional hint lowers your score. Can you solve the puzzle before all hints are revealed? Challenge yourself and climb the leaderboard!
offside-description: Offside is a fast-paced logic game that tests your ability to distinguish between truth and deception! You start with 120 points and are presented with six statements—some are true, and some are false. Your goal is to identify the correct ones while avoiding the false ones. But be careful! Every wrong choice deducts points from your score. Can you keep your score high and make the right calls? Challenge yourself and prove your sharp judgment!
